articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Large Combined Unit 324.
					 Their colorful performance included numbers like "Glory to Our Great Party" and "Attraction and Reverence." 
					
					 The art squad successfully represented the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which has grown to be a matchless army under the care of the Supreme Commander and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche which started in the forests of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 It clearly proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of conducting anti-Japanese guerrilla style performing activities by fully displaying the same enthusiasm and spirit as done when arousing servicepersons to struggles and feats through militant frontline agitation at trenches and in drill grounds and construction sites. It also powerfully demonstrated the might of the army art organization successfully performing its sacred mission as a bugler in the era of Songun, imbuing them with ardent love for the party, the leader, the country and its people. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance given by the members of the art squad with art pieces of great cognitive and educational value as they truthfully represented the inexhaustible mental power of the soldiers, their noble moral traits and worthwhile service. He highly appreciated their successful performance and extended thanks to them.
					
					 The art agitation is of very weighty significance as it has strong influence and appeal in the ideological education of the soldiers, he noted, advancing the tasks to be fulfilled to intensify the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were  Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong,  members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK,  Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, members of the C.C., the WPK, and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: KAPPC Urges S. Korean Ministry of Unification to Start N-S Talks
articles.content:
KAPPC Urges S. Korean Ministry of Unification to Start N-S Talks
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee urged the south Korean Ministry of Unification to open north-south talks at an early date.
					 This urge was made in a notice sent to the ministry on Jan. 31. 
					
					 The DPRK proposed holding north-south dialogues including talks between the authorities and Red Cross talks through the joint statement of its government, political parties and organizations and the statement of a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, etc., the notice said. Now is the time for the authorities of the north and the south to sit face to face and have exhaustive and constructive talks now that the Korean People's Army's magnanimous proposal for holding high-level military talks removed all the hurdles lying in the way of the inter-Korean dialogue, it added. 
					
					 It urged once again the south side to seek a sincere negotiated settlement of humanitarian issues including the reunion of separated families and relatives and all other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Kim Chaek's Death Anniversary Observed
articles.content:
Kim Chaek's Death Anniversary Observed 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to observe the 60th anniversary of death of revolutionary fighter Kim Chaek. 
					 Present at the service were senior officials of party, army and state, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, public and working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators, meritorious persons and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Kim Chaek took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle following the road of the Korean revolution indicated by President Kim Il Sung and skillfully organized military and political activities. He thus made a great contribution to crushing the Japanese imperialists and achieving the historic cause of country's liberation. 
					
					 After the liberation of the country Kim Chaek rendered distinguished services for building the party and the state, strengthening the revolutionary armed forces and laying the foundation of the independent national economy with intense loyalty and persevering power of execution. In that period he held such important positions as member of the Political Committee of the Party Central Committee, first director of Pyongyang Institute, vice-chairman of the People's Committee of North Korea and director of the Bureau of National Defence, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Industry. 
					
					 He commanded many military operations, performing shining feats in implementing the military strategic policy put forward by the President while holding the posts of a member of the DPRK Military Commission and commander of the front during the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, said in a memorial address that brief as Kim's life was, his life is always remembered by the party and the people as a model of a genuine revolutionary who was intensely loyal to Kim Il Sung with transparent revolutionary outlook on him. 
					
					 Kim Chaek was a human shield for protecting the safety of the President, regarding it as his primary duty to ensure his safety, Ri Yong Ho noted, and continued:
					
					 His unfailing loyalty to the leader and noble traits as a revolutionary powerfully encourage the army and people of the DPRK in their dynamic advance to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Chaek, Revolutionary Martyr, Paid
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Chaek, Revolutionary Martyr, Paid
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of Kim Chaek, a revolutionary martyr, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Monday on the 60th anniversary of his death.
					 Seen there was a wreath from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun, Yang Hyong Sop and other officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, soldiers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of education organs, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people in the City of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the bust were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Also laid with bouquets were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, ministries and national institutions, KPA units and party and power organs and universities in the city.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the memory of Kim Chaek.
					
					  Laid before his statues in Kim Chaek City, North Hamgyong Province and at Kim Chaek Air Force University, too, were wreaths in the name of local party and power organs, KPA units, industrial establishments and others.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Hosts Friendly Meeting with Chinese
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Hosts Friendly Meeting with Chinese
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry arranged a New Year friendly meeting with staff members of the Chinese embassy here on Monday.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy.
					
					 Minister Pak Ui Chun and other officials of the ministry were on hand.
					
					 After speeches, the participants talked to each other about the need to further strengthen the traditional DPRK-China friendly relations.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting with Vietnamese Embassy Officials
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting with Vietnamese Embassy Officials 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Monday with the approach of the lunar New Year. 
					 Present there on invitation were Vietnamese Ambassador Le Van Cu and embassy staff members. 
					
					 Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, and other officials of the association and officials concerned were on hand. 
					
					 A speech was made before a video show on the DPRK-Vietnam friendly relations. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Wang Jing, chairman and chief executive officer of the China Beijing Xinwei Telecom Enterprise Group, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Wang.

articles.title: Plenary Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
articles.content:
Plenary Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The 62nd plenary meeting of the C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea took place in Pyongyang on Jan. 27 and the 59th plenary meeting of the C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea on Jan. 31.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the Central Committees of the unions and officials of their organizations in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meetings discussed the tasks of the unions to strictly implement the joint New Year editorial. 
					
					 Reports and speeches were made there.

articles.title: Veterinary Hospital Appears at Central Zoo
articles.content:
Veterinary Hospital Appears at Central Zoo
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A veterinary hospital made its appearance at the Central Zoo at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang.
					 The hospital covering more than 2,000 square meters has rooms for operation and intensive medical care, sick wards, rooms for diagnosis and other rooms.
					
					 The hospital has portable ultrasonic wave examiners, life indicators, roentgens and other equipment for speedy and accurate diagnosis.
					
					 The anti-epizootic room has medical appliances for prevention vaccine inoculation, vaccine sprayers for disinfection of animal sheds and insect killing and coolers. The dispensary has various kinds of medicines for treatment of animal diseases including antibiotic medicine and vitamin.
					
					 The appearance of the veterinary hospital helps put the promotion of health of animals and their propagation and raising on a scientific basis and boost the Zoo's status as a world class zoo.

articles.title: Spring Water Good for Health
articles.content:
Spring Water Good for Health
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- There are a lot of spring water sites good for health in the DPRK.
					 One of them is the Ryongaksan spring water site on the outskirts of Pyongyang.
					
					 The spring water is called a cure-all as it is especially efficacious for the treatment of chronic colitis, chronic gastritis, duodenal ulcer, chronic hepatitis, etc. and has antioxidant effect.
					
					 According to scientists, the spring water is recognized as one for longevity as it contains major ions and various minerals.
					
					 It also meets the international water quality standard.
					
					 The DPRK government built a spring water factory in the area of Mt. Ryongak in 2007 for supplying it to the citizens of Pyongyang on a regular basis.
					
					 Manager Kim Tong Suk, 60, told in an excited tone about the warm loving care and benevolence shown by the Workers' Party of Korea for the supply of the spring water to the citizens.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il recently gave field guidance to the factory. He tasted the water produced there and appreciated it.

articles.title: US Theory of "Pacific Country" Aimed at Asian Conquest
articles.content:
US Theory of "Pacific Country" Aimed at Asian Conquest
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The United States, styling itself a "Pacific country", has held that it should attach greater importance to Asia and expand "cooperation" with Asian nations.
					 Kurt Campbell, assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the U.S., told a recent hearing of the International Relations Committee of the House of Representatives that the U.S. should fully discharge its "role" as a "big power of Asia".
					
					 His remark, in a nutshell, means that the U.S. is a "Pacific country".
					
					 The U.S. geographically belongs to North America. Asia is far apart from the U.S. with the Pacific Ocean in between. Asian nations are quite different from the U.S. in the way of life, race, customs and skin color. There is no ground in any aspect to term the U.S. a Pacific country and an Asian nation.
					
					 Then why are the U.S. authorities talking about the theory of "Pacific country"?
					
					 This is related with the U.S. theory of "Pacific Empire".
					
					 William Seward, who regarded it as his mission to expand the U.S. territory in North America, used to say the U.S. should put the Pacific region under its control for domination over the world. He also said the greater theatre of the U.S. political and economic activities was the Asia-Pacific region. From that time onward, the advocates of the theory asserted that the supreme power over the Pacific region should be taken by the U.S. and that the Pacific region and Asia should be possessed by the U.S. like Texas and California.
					
					 In the period of the Reagan Administration, the theory of "Pacific country" became a U.S. doctrine with its foreign policy switched over to Asia from Europe. Ronald Reagan said that being a "Pacific country", the U.S. should advance into the region in the spirit of a "pioneer".
					
					 The Asia-Pacific region is vital for the U.S. from the geopolitical and strategic point of view.
					
					 Unlike in Europe, found in the region are powers the U.S. considers to be "potential rivals". The region is blessed with rich natural and human resources tempting the U.S. monopolists' cupidity. Besides, the region is of strategic importance. 
					
					 This is why the U.S. has done its best to place the Asia-Pacific region under its military control, regarding the fate of its strategy for world domination depends on it.
					
					The theory of "Pacific country" is just a theory of Asia conquest.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Colonial Rule over Korea Can Never Be Written Off
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Colonial Rule over Korea Can Never Be Written Off
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- February 1 marks the lapse of 105 years since the Japanese imperialists established a colonial resident-general rule over Korea. 
					 After illegally occupying Korea, the Japanese imperialists set up the Residency-General in Seoul in 1906 pursuant to "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" faked up by them in a bid to enforce their colonial rule over Korea in all fields.
					
					 The resident-general was a supreme ruler who exercised all powers in Korea, including legislative, judicial and administrative powers and prerogative over the army.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists massively brought troops, MPs and police to Korea for the purpose of intensifying the rule, turning it into a huge prison. They, at the same time, systematically weakened the royal authority of the feudal government of the Ri Dynasty.
					
					 They suppressed and killed a great many Korean patriots whom they deemed obstructive to their colonial rule.
					
					 At least 16,000 were murdered by the Japanese imperialists between August 1907 and June 1911, according to data available.
					
					 They cooked up the "law on mining" and "Korea-Japan fishery agreement" and others under the pretext of "promoting welfare" and plundered Korea of huge resources.
					
					 They also completely controlled the financial field of Korea, hindering the development of its national capital.
					
					 The crimes they committed in Korea through their colonial resident- general rule can neither be written off nor covered up no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.

articles.title: Abrogation of S. Korea's Evil Law Urged in US
articles.content:
Abrogation of S. Korea's Evil Law Urged in US
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Korean residents in the United States and its citizens staged a demonstration outside the south Korean consulate general in Los Angeles on Jan. 24, demanding the abrogation of south Korea's "National Security Law" (NSL).
					 They were members of Koreans' organizations supporting the Joint Measure Committee for the Frustration of the Suppression of the Socialist Workers' Federation and the Repeal of NSL which Violates the Freedom of Political Activities and Thinking in south Korea and American progressive organizations.
					
					 The demonstrators pointed out that the south Korean authorities seek to bring to the final trial seven members of the Socialist Workers' Federation including O Se Chol, chairman of the steering committee of the Federation and honorary professor of Yonsei University.
					
					 The authorities are trying to punish those members of the Federation by invoking the NSL, a fascist law, they charged.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to stop at once the suppression of the Federation, putting up the slogan "Abrogate NSL!"

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
						
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on Jan. 21 and 24 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 There were a meeting and film show in Dominica and a film show in Ukraine.
					
					 Korean films shown included "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Reply of Korea".
					
					 Ramon Almanzar, president of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica, noted that the DPRK has exercised in a dignified manner its sovereignty in international arena and wrought miracles in building an economic power. This is the results of the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 The WPK led by him will always win victory after victory, the chairman stressed.
					
					 Ivan Rodriguez, general secretary of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica, said that reverence for Kim Jong Il is growing deeper with each passing day. Despite the vicious obstructive moves of the U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries, the DPRK have made admirable achievements one after another that startle the world and give confidence to us, he noted, adding: The secret of those successes lies in Kim Jong Il's mysterious politics.
					
					 A vice-rector of Poltava City University of Agriculture in Ukraine said that the DPRK is confidently advancing toward the eminence of a thriving nation thanks to its original political philosophy, power serving the people and invincible army provided under the distinguished leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Dominica.

articles.title: World Community Hails DPRK Joint Statement
articles.content:
World Community Hails DPRK Joint Statement
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK joint statement of government, political parties and organizations has aroused positive support from among the international community. Carried in the statement is an important proposal for tiding over the difficulties on the Korean Peninsula, improving the north-south relations and opening up a new phase for peace and reunification. 
					 In a little more than 20 days since the publication of the statement many media of different countries gave coverage to the full text or gist of it.
					
					 More than 100 governments, political parties and organizations, international and regional organizations and personages of different circles made public statements and appeals to fully support the peace-loving proposal of the DPRK. 
					
					 They unanimously described the proposal as an epoch-making and important one for improving the inter-Korean relations at a catastrophe and bringing the bright prospect of Korea's reunification.
					
					 They also called upon governments, political parties and organizations of all countries, international organizations and progressive peoples who love justice, truth and peace to extend support to the joint statement.
					
					 The Guinean government sent the DPRK embassy a note that the important proposal would be a sure guarantee for global peace and stability.
					
					 Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people took place in different countries in this regard.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Marked in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee was formed in Prague on Jan. 25 to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The committee elected Jaroslavc Kafka, chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, to be its chairman. 
					
					 It decided to widely introduce Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits, hold diverse political and cultural events and publish a special issue of bulletin on the occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige complejos en la ciudad de Hamhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige complejos en la ciudad de Hamhung
  Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las empresas importantes de la ciudad de Hamhung que aceleran la marcha para producir un gran cambio en la vida del pueblo.
					  Primero, estuvo en el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					
					  Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano perspectivo, se entero detalladamente del estado de produccion y construccion recorriendo el taller de hilado vertical, el de estiramiento y cortadura de la fibra y otros lugares.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la clase obrera del complejo marchara adelante en la produccion y la construccion registrando innovaciones continuas con aquel impetu con que puso jubiloso a todo el pais con la avalancha de vinalon.
					
					  Conversando con los obreros, incluyendo Ri Yong Suk quien estiraba y cortaba con esmero el vinalon, saludo cordialmente a la clase obrera del complejo que se esfuerza ingentemente por producir y suministrar al pueblo las telas de buena calidad.
					
					  Senalando que este complejo tiene la mision y papel muy importantes porque esta relacionado directamente con la vida del pueblo, presento las tareas a cumplir por esta empresa.
					
					  Acto seguido, dirigio el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					
					  Los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del complejo volvieron a demostrar la inagotable facultad creativa de la heroica clase obrera de Corea al fabricar con exito en un corto tiempo los equipos necesarios a la absorcion de gas y los compresores de sintesis de amonio usando el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en las fuerzas propias.
					
					Al principio, ellos quisieron importar esos equipos para terminar lo mas pronto posible la obra de gasificacion de Hungnam, pero el pais extranjero, que recibio la oferta, no los ha suministrado hasta la fecha bajo el pretexto de que tienen doble uso.
					
					  Luego de intercambiar el saludo con los funcionarios que le recibieron, se entero detalladamente del estado de produccion visitando el taller de compresores, el de maquinas de gran tamano y otras partes.
					
					  Contemplo largamente los equipos de gran tamano incluyendo la torre de sintesis de amonio, la de condensacion y separacion y la de refinacion de hidrogeno y se puso muy complacido de que la clase obrera de Ryongsong haya hecho magnificamente con las fuerzas y tecnologias propias esos modernos equipos de gasificacion al estilo coreano.
					
					  Este exito es el valioso fruto del espiritu de autoconfianza de la clase obrera de Ryongsong, senalo y evaluo altamente los meritos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del complejo quienes realizaron ese gran milagro, que se transmitira siempre con la epoca del Songun, dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion acompanadas de patriotismo.
					
					  Subrayo que el complejo, una de las poderosas bases de los equipos pedidos de nuestro pais, ocupa la posicion muy importante en la lucha por cumplir la causa de nuestro partido por construir una gran potencia prospera y presento las tareas que incumben a esa empresa.
					
					  Por ultimo, dirigio el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, una de las grandes bases de produccion de fertilizante.
					
					  Sobre todo, recorrio el lugar de construccion del proceso de gasificacion.
					
					  Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano del proceso, averiguo en detalles como marcha la obra pasando revista al lugar.
					
					  Senalo que cuando termine la obra, se hara mas solido el autoctono sistema de produccion de abono basado en las materias primas nacionales y se producira un cambio decisivo en los proyectos para resolver el problema alimentario.
					
					  Paso por el taller de electrolisis de agua y los otros procesos productivos enterandose de los detalles de modernizacion tecnica y produccion. 
					
					  Son muy importantes la posicion y el papel de este complejo para situar en una etapa mas alta la produccion agricola, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que incumben a el.
					
					  Recordo que la ciudad de Hamhung ocupa la posicion importante en el desarrollo economico del pais porque tiene muchas fabricas grandes que desempenan gran papel en la solucion de los problemas de vestido, alimento y vivienda.
					
					Por eso, esa ciudad debe cumplir el papel de vanguardia en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida del pueblo y la construccion de una gran potencia prospera, concluyo.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Kwak Pom Gi, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de empleados de complejos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de empleados de complejos
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de grupos artisticos de los empleados de los Complejos de Abonos de Hungnam y de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					  En la escena se pusieron diversas piezas, entre ellas, el poema en dialogo "Apreciacion de amor", el solo femenino "Tendremos en gran estima al padre General", la narracion con cancion y baile "Vinalon, orgullo de mi pais", la musica de instrumentos de viento y coro "El camino de victoria" y la poesia a coro y el coro "Con la eterna fidelidad".
					
					  Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la felicidad y el orgullo de ellos mismos quienes abren la brecha de la construccion de la potencia economica sirviendose de destacamento de vanguardia de la revolucion en el regazo del Dirigente y manifestaron con vigor el impetu combativo de la heroica clase obrera de Corea, que llena de la conviccion y el optimismo en la victoria, avanza a todo galope hacia la cumbre de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los miembros de los grupos artisticos del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam y el de Vinalon 8 de Febrero hayan hecho la excelente funcion con las obras de gran significacion cognoscitiva y educativa que reflejan sinceramente su vida laboral, aprecio el exito de la funcion de ellos y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas para fortalecer las actividades culturales y artisticas entre las masas.
					
					  Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que nuestra clase obrera, que apoya la causa del partido y el Lider, creara incesantes saltos e innovaciones en la produccion y la construccion tocando el tambor de la revolucion tambien en futuro como la brigada de la marcha en gran auge para mejorar la vida del pueblo y como los creadores de nueva cultura de la epoca del Songun.
					
					  Le acompanaron los miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del Comite Central del PTC Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, la miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, el miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC Thae Jong Su, el miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur Kwak Pom Gi y los funcionarios directivos de dichos complejos.

articles.title: CCPAP demanda al Sur de Corea apertura pronta de dialogo N-S
articles.content:
CCPAP demanda al Sur de Corea apertura pronta de dialogo N-S 
  Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- El Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) envio el dia 31 un aviso al Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea demandando la apertura pronta de los dialogos entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					  La nota recuerda que a traves de la declaracion conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la declaracion del portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), etc., la RPDC propuso ya sostener los dialogos Norte-Sur, incluso las conversaciones entre las autoridades y las de cruz roja. 
					
					  Puesto que van a eliminarse todos los obstaculos para el dialogo gracias a la propuesta magnanima del Ejercito Popular de Corea de realizar las conversaciones militares de alto nivel, llego el tiempo de que las autoridades de ambas partes sostengan conversaciones sinceras y constructivas, senala el aviso.
					
					  Exige una vez mas a la parte Sur discutir y resolver seriamente mediante las conversaciones Norte-Sur los problemas humanitarios como encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y otros temas de interes comun.

articles.title: MINREX organiza encuentro con miembros de embajada china
articles.content:
MINREX organiza encuentro con miembros de embajada china
						
  Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea preparo este lunes un encuentro de amistad con los miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					  Fueron invitados a la ocasion el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes el canciller Pak Ui Chun y otros funcionarios de la cancilleria coreana.
					
					 Tras escuchar intervenciones, los reunidos departieron sobre el tema de desarrollar mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad Corea-China.

articles.title: Acto central por 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Acto central por 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Chaek 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 60o aniversario del fallecimiento del combatiente revolucionario Kim Chaek. 
					  Estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del Partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, familiares de martires revolucionarios, innovadores laborales y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					  Al tomar parte en la lucha armada antijaponesa siguiendo la ruta de la revolucion coreana indicada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, organizo con destreza las operaciones politicas y militares e hizo asi gran aporte a la aniquilacion de los imperialistas japoneses y al cumplimiento de la historica causa de liberacion de la patria. 
					
					  Una vez liberada la patria, trabajo en cargos importantes como miembro de la Comision Politica del Comite Central del Partido, primer director de la Escuela de Pyongyang, vicepresidente del Comite Popular de Corea del Norte y director de Defensa Nacional, vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros y ministro de Industria. 
					
					En esos dias, dando pruebas de su infinita fidelidad y capacidad ejecutiva, hizo una contribucion especial a la construccion del partido y el Estado, al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y a la preparacion de la base de economia nacional independiente. 
					
					  En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953),  siendo miembro de la Comision Militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y comandante del frente, organizo y condujo muchas operaciones militares realizando relevantes meritos en materializar las orientaciones estrategicas y militares presentadas por el Presidente. 
					
					  Al pronunciar el discurso de la ocasion, el vicemariscal Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, dijo que aunque fue corta la vida de Kim Chaek, quien tenia la firme concepcion revolucionaria del lider y era muy fiel al Presidente Kim Il Sung, el esta presente siempre en la memoria del partido y el pueblo como modelo de verdadero revolucionario. 
					
					  Kim Chaek habia considerado como su primer deber defender la seguridad personal del Presidente y lucho para este fin siendo escudo, apunto Ri.
					
					  La infinita fidelidad al lider y los nobles rasgos revolucionarios de Kim Chaek estimulan mucho de generacion en generacion y de siglo en siglo la lucha del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que avanzan a pasos firmes por coronar la causa revolucionaria del Juche, concluyo.

articles.title: ATCC revela esencia de teoria de "Estado del Pacifico" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ATCC revela esencia de teoria de "Estado del Pacifico" de EE.UU.
						
  Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, Estados Unidos insiste en conceder mayor importancia a Asia y ampliar la "cooperacion" con los paises asiaticos autodenominandose de "Estado del Pacifico". 
					  Hace poco, el asistente del Secretario de Estado norteamericano para Asuntos de Asia Oriental y el Pacifico, Kurt Campbell, en la audiencia de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Camara de Representantes dijo que EE.UU. debe desempenar el "papel" de "potencia de Asia".   
					
					  Desde el punto de vista geografico, EE.UU. se halla en America del Norte. 
					
					Asia esta muy apartada de EE.UU. teniendo en el medio el extensisimo Mar del Pacifico.
					
					Ademas, los paises asiaticos y EE.UU. se difieren mucho en los modos de vida, razas, idiosincrasias, colores de piel, etc.
					
					  Entonces, ?por que el circulo dominante de EE.UU. difunde la teoria de "Estado del Pacifico"?
					
					  Para encontrar la respuesta, habria que recordar la doctrina de "imperio del Pacifico". 
					
					  El expansionista William Seward, representante de ese pensamiento, consideraba como su mision extender el territorio dominado por EE.UU. en America del Norte.
					
					  El opinaba que para dominar el mundo, hay que controlar el Pacifico argumentando que "esta region es el escenario mas grande de acciones politicas y economicas de EE.UU."
					
					  Desde entonces, los defensores de la doctrina de "imperio del Pacifico" insistieron en que "el dominio del Pacifico lo debe tomar sin falta EE.UU." y "el Pacifico y Asia deben ser propiedades de EE.UU. como Texas y California". 
					
					  En la administracion Reagan, la politica exterior de EE.UU. comenzo a dar importancia a Asia, en lugar de Europa, y la teoria de "Estado del Pacifico" se hizo una doctrina estatal. 
					
					  El entonces presidente estadounidense Reagan dijo que "EE.UU. debe avanzar al Pacifico con el ´espiritu de explorador´ porque es un Estado de esta region".
					
					  Para EE.UU., Asia-Pacifico es una region vital tanto en el sentido geopolitico como en el estrategico-militar. 
					
					  A diferencia de Europa, en esa region hay muchas potencias consideradas por EE.UU. como "rivales potenciales". Ademas, los abundantes  recursos naturales y humanos bastan para despertar el apetito de los codiciosos monopolistas norteamericanos. 
					
					  EE.UU. hace todo lo posible para establecer el dominio militar sobre la region pensando que el triunfo o la derrota de su estrategia de dominar el mundo depende de tomar o no el control de ella. 
					
					  Pues, la teoria de "Estado del Pacifico" de EE.UU. es, en su esencia, el pensamiento para dominar a Asia.
